view.name: DOHMH New York City Restaurant Inspection Results
view.attribution: Department of Health and Mental Hygiene (DOHMH)
view.description: This dataset provides restaurant inspections, violations, grades and adjudication information

columns.name: CAMIS
columns.description: This is an unique identifier for the entity (restaurant)

columns.name: DBA
columns.description: This field represents the name (doing business as) of the entity (restaurant)

columns.name: BORO
columns.description: Borough in which the entity (restaurant) is located. NOTE: There may be discrepancies between zip code and listed boro due to differences in an establishment's mailing address and physical location

columns.name: BUILDING
columns.description: This field represents the building number for the entity (restaurant)

columns.name: STREET
columns.description: This field represents the street name at which the entity (restaurant) is located.

columns.name: ZIPCODE
columns.description: Zip code as per the address of the entity (restaurant)

columns.name: CUISINE DESCRIPTION
columns.description: This field describes the entity (restaurant) cuisine.

columns.name: INSPECTION DATE
columns.description: This field represents the date of inspection

columns.name: ACTION
columns.description: This field represents the actions that is associated with each restaurant inspection.

columns.name: VIOLATION CODE
columns.description: This field represents the violation codes that is associated with each restaurant inspection.

columns.name: VIOLATION DESCRIPTION
columns.description: This field is the description that corresponds to the violation codes

columns.name: CRITICAL FLAG
columns.description: This indicates if Violation is critical or not.

columns.name: SCORE
columns.description: Total Score for a particular inspection.   If there was adjudication a judge may reduce the  total points for the inspection and this field will have the update amount.

columns.name: GRADE
columns.description:
• N = Not Yet Graded
• A = Grade A
• B = Grade B
• C = Grade C
• Z = Grade Pending
• P= Grade Pending issued on re-opening following an initial inspection that resulted in a closure

columns.name: GRADE DATE
columns.description: The date when the current grade was issued to the entity (restaurant)

columns.name: RECORD DATE
columns.description: The date when the extract was run to produce this data set

columns.name: INSPECTION TYPE
columns.description: The type of inspection.  A combination of the program and inspection type.

Dataset Information.Agency: Department of Health and Mental Hygiene (DOHMH)

attachments.name: About NYC Restaurant Inspection Data on NYC OpenData 082014.docx
attachments.filename: About NYC Restaurant Inspection Data on NYC OpenData 082014.docx
